text: Věra Růžičková (10 August 1928 – 24 November 2018) was a Czechoslovak gymnast. She competed in the 1948 Summer Olympics. She was born in Brno. She won a gold medal as a member of the Czechoslovak squad in the team competition at the 1948 Summer Olympics in London. Růžičková died in Prague on 24 November 2018 from breast cancer at the age of 90.Zemřela olympijská vítězka v gymnastice z Londýna 1948 Růžičková ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1928 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for Czechoslovakia Category:Czechoslovak gymnasts
title: Věra Růžičková
